title: Today's Horoscope
subtitle: {date} · Your destiny reading for today
ctaTitle: Want a more detailed destiny analysis?
ctaDesc: Get a comprehensive AI-powered destiny analysis with over 30,000 characters of insight.
tryAnother: Try a different date of birth
dayMessages: Sunday — take rest and recharge your energy.
Monday — a fresh start awaits you this week.
Tuesday — a wonderful day to act with full energy.
Wednesday — midweek check to realign your path.
Thursday — energies of growth and expansion are with you.
Friday — a great time to enjoy the fruits of your efforts.
Saturday — seek balance and harmony in your day.

fortune.same: Today, the energy of {element} is doubled for you. Stay true to yourself and good results shall follow.
fortune.sameAdvice: Be confident and take charge of your actions.
fortune.generates: Today's {todayEl} energy originates from your {myEl}. A day brimming with creative energy awaits you.
fortune.generatesAdvice: An excellent day to turn your new ideas into reality.
fortune.generatedBy: The energy of {todayEl} is supporting your {myEl} today. Welcome help from those around you.
fortune.generatedByAdvice: Teamwork and good communication will bring you luck.
fortune.overcomes: Your {myEl} energy is commanding today's {todayEl}. A fine day to demonstrate leadership.
fortune.overcomesAdvice: Take the initiative and guide the situation to your advantage.
fortune.overcomeBy: Today's {todayEl} energy is quite strong, so do not overexert yourself. Focus on building your inner strength.
fortune.overcomeByAdvice: Patient preparation is better than rushing ahead today.
